web.title: AI in Cybersecurity: 2-Day Practical Workshop
web.Short Description: Join us for a 02 days practical workshop on AI in Cybersecurity!
web.Description: Learn how Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning are reshaping the way we detect threats, respond to attacks, and secure systems. We’ll cover the latest trends like AI-powered penetration testing, phishing detection tools, and real-world applications. Plus, get hands-on with a live coding session on detecting malicious URLs using AI. Perfect for students, cybersecurity enthusiasts, and professionals looking to stay ahead in the AI-driven security era. A soft copy of the certificate, along with the source code, datasets, and other resources, will be provided to all participants.
